main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Vallejo, California on April 16, 1952, involving a light orange colored disk shaped object that was observed for approximately 10 seconds.
interesting points: The object was first seen near the star Capella,.The object's trajectory was straight, and it grew dim before 'going out',.The observer, a school official and amateur astronomer, described the object as fast,.Another report mentions similar sightings in the area around the same time,.The object was estimated to be about half the diameter of the full moon.
